Search BED files by text

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_bed_text_search.Rd

Returns all available results scored.

bb_bed_text_search(api, query, limit = 10, offset = 0)

Arguments

api

API object of BEDbase created from bedbaser()

query

character() keywords to search

limit

integer() (default 10) maximum number of results

offset

integer() (default 0) page offset of results

Value

tibble()

Examples

api <- bedbaser()
bb_bed_text_search(api, "hg38")
#> # A tibble: 10 × 31
